channel.title: Makiing client - somone point me in the right direction please
channel.description:
hey im making a client and iv got about 80% done insept i need to know how to do a few thingss.
1. costomize log in box - put a pic in it or something
2. add a label/text to the backgroud of the text/chat box in game.
3. add a pic or label to the invo box
if u know link to a tut for any of these can you link me or if you know how can you help me
rep++
thanks
